cards.name: I: The Magician
cards.upright: Creativity. Free will. Self-reliance. Skill. Spontaneity. Willpower. Self-confidence. A good salesman. Dexterity. Ingenuity. Deception. Trickery. Sleight of hand.
cards.reversed: Ineptitude. Insecurity. Spinelessness. Manipulation. Submission. Corruption. Disquiet. Delay. Lack of imagination. Willpower applied to evil ends. Disgrace.

cards.name: II: The High Priestess
cards.upright: Wisdom. Sound judgment. Common sense. Penetrating insight. Education. Compromise. Hidden emotion. Transcendence. Pragmatism. Sober analysis. Restraint.
cards.reversed: Ignorance. Shortsightedness. Misunderstanding. Selfishness. Superficiality. Shallowness. Haste. Inattention. A premature conclusion.

cards.name: III: The Empress
cards.upright: Action. Fertility. Empowerment. Marriage. A Mother, sister or wife/girlfriend. Feminine influence. Female guiles. Cooperation. Partnership. Disparate forces united.
cards.reversed: Vacillation. Inaction. A lack of concentration. Anxiety. Obsession. Loss. Scarcity. Co-dependence. Overprotectiveness. Vanity. Delay.

cards.name: IV: The Emperor
cards.upright: Political power. Accomplishment. Confidence. A father, brother or husband. Masculine influence. Wealth. Maturity. Stability. Authority. Leadership. Conviction.
cards.reversed: Immaturity. Ineffectiveness. Weakness. Sentimentality. Indecision. Cowardice. Rashness. Pettiness. Ego.

cards.name: V: The Hierophant
cards.upright: Ritualism. Kindness. Compassion. Good intentions. Platonic friendship. Inactivity. Doubt. Timidity. Imperception. Recalcitrance. Obstinance.
cards.reversed: Misplaced generosity. Undeserved trust. Repeated errors. Gullibility. Vulnerability. Frailty. Renunciation. Fraud. Artifice.

cards.name: VI: The Lovers
cards.upright: Love. Beauty. Perfection. Harmony. Trust. Honor. A new relationship. Deep emotion. Soulfulness. A test of sincerity. Sensuality.
cards.reversed: Unreliability. Failure. Separation. Frustration. Interference. Fickleness. Foolishness. Scheming. Foolhardiness.

cards.name: VII: The Chariot
cards.upright: Fortitude. Perseverance. Effort. Travel. Victory. Triumph. Escape. Prematurity. Trouble. Adversity. Conflict. Turmoil. Vengeance.
cards.reversed: Failure. Defeat. Sudden collapse. Conquest. Overwhelm. Denial. Fatigue. Unexpected loss. Resignation. Inadequacy.

cards.name: VIII: Justice
cards.upright: Fairness. Logic. Justice. Balance. Harmony. Just reward. Sincerity. Good intentions. Altruism. Charity. Self-assuredness. Good advice.
cards.reversed: Unfairness. Abuse. False accusations. Harsh judgment. Stereotypes. Intolerance. Backstabbing. Bias. Bad advice.

cards.name: IX: The Hermit
cards.upright: Counsel. Knowledge. Solicitude. Introspection. Prudence. Discretion. Caution. Vigilance. Circumspection. Denial. Withdrawal. Regression. Desertion.
cards.reversed: Haste or rashness. An immature person. Foolish imprudence. Bad advice. Sloth or laziness. Dull, mindless repetition. Banality.

cards.name: X: The Wheel of Fortune
cards.upright: Destiny. Fortune. Fate. Luck. Perseverance. Culmination. Conclusion. Solution. Surprise. Realization.
cards.reversed: Failure. Ill luck. Discontinuity. Bad luck. Short-sightedness. Illogicality. Missed opportunity.

cards.name: XI: Strength
cards.upright: Control. Strength. Courage. Fortitude. Conviction. Energy. Determination. Defiance. Action. Confidence. Accomplishment. Conquest. Fervor. Zeal.
cards.reversed: Weakness. Pettiness. Impotency. Sickness. Faithlessness. Corruption. Abuse. Temptation. Indifference. Apathy.

cards.name: XII: The Hanged Man
cards.upright: Suspension. Precariousness. Reversal. Boredom. Frustration. Abandonment. Renunciation. Sacrifice. Readjustment. Regeneration. Rebirth.
cards.reversed: Hopelessness. Preoccupation. Ego. False prediction. Sacrifice in vain. Ineptitude. Restriction. Racing thoughts. Daydream.

cards.name: XIII: Death
cards.upright: Transformation. Transition. Alteration. Abrupt change. Inauspiciousness. An illness or injury. Mishap. A financial loss. A bad investment.
cards.reversed: Stagnation. Immobility. An aversion to change. Inertia. Shock. A lingering memory. Nostalgia. Retrospection.

cards.name: XIV: Temperance
cards.upright: Temperance. Patience. Harmony. Restoration. Management. Compatibility. Adjustment. Beneficence. Auspice. Discovery.
cards.reversed: Discord. Disunion. Conflict. Hostility. Quarrelousness. Noncomformity. Loner. Hermit. Solitude.

cards.name: XV: The Devil
cards.upright: Subordination. Bondage. Downfall. Déjà vu. Unexpected failure. Goals unrealized. Depression. Insanity. Duplicitousness. Controversy. Self-punishment.
cards.reversed: Liberation. Manumission. Release. Deliverance. Independence. Unshackling. Divorce. Understanding. Enlightenment.

cards.name: XVI: The Falling Tower
cards.upright: Suddenness. Abandonment. Catastrophe. Disturbance. Breakup. Shock. Downfall. Undoing. Instability. Setback.
cards.reversed: Oppression. Stubbornness. An unsustainable situation. A rut. Dissatisfaction. A logjam. Embeddedness.

cards.name: XVII: The Star
cards.upright: Hope. Faith. Auspice. Tradition. Heritage. Optimism. Fulfillment. Satisfaction. Pleasure. Comfort. Happiness.
cards.reversed: Unfulfillment. Pessimism. Bad luck. Missed opportunity. Failure in business. Letdown. Disappointment.

cards.name: XVIII: The Moon
cards.upright: Deception. Obscurity. Trickery. Dishonesty. Danger. Error. Insincerity. Deceit. Double-dealing. Fraud. Caution.
cards.reversed: Trifling mistake. Undeserved reward. Advantage. Inside information. Bullet dodged. Brush with death.

cards.name: XIX: The Sun
cards.upright: Satisfaction. Accomplishment. A hard-fought reputation. Devotion. A happy engagement or marriage. Serenity. Exuberance. Sincerity.
cards.reversed: Unhappiness. Loneliness. A sudden breakup. Cancellation. Uncertainty. Difficulty.

cards.name: XX: Judgment
cards.upright: Atonement. Judgment. Repentance. Forgiveness. Account. Improvement. Development. Promotion. Outcome. Rebirth.
cards.reversed: Delay. Frustration. Denial. Indecision. Procrastination. Theft. Alienation. Unrequited love. Deep worry.

cards.name: XXI: The World
cards.upright: Perfection. Recognition. Honor. Ultimate change. Fulfillment. Capability. Triumph in undertakings. Just rewards from hard work. Success. Admiration of others.
cards.reversed: Imperfection. Indiscipline. Myopia. Shortsightedness. Disappointment. Futility. Broken heart. Resignation.

cards.name: XXII: The Fool
cards.upright: Beginning of an adventure. Enthusiasm. Initiative. New school or job. Unlimited possibilities. Thoughtlessness. Extravagance. Folly. Obsession.
cards.reversed: Faulty choice. Bad decision. Apathy. Hesitation. Indecision. Failure to diligently proceed. Ignoring opportunities. Shyness.

cards.name: Ace of Swords
cards.upright: Great determination. Forcefulness and initiative. Strength, fitness and physical activity. Triumph and conquest. Political power. Fertility. Prosperity or success in business. Deep emotions.
cards.reversed: Debacle. Tyranny. Disaster. Self-destruction. Violent temper. Embarrassment. Obstacle. Infertility. Hindrance.

cards.name: Two of Swords
cards.upright: Balance. Harmony. A firm ultimatum. Concord. A tactical stalemate. Affection. A truce. Courtesy. Tact necessary to maintain peace.
cards.reversed: Duplicity. Falsehoods and misrepresentation. Disloyalty. Dishonor. Treachery and lies. A false friend. A fraud presented as a fair deal.

cards.name: Three of Swords
cards.upright: Absence. Sorrow. Disappointment. Strife. Displacement. Dispersion. Diversion. Opposition. Separation. Delay. Tears. Unhappiness. Affliction. Grief.
cards.reversed: Distraction. Confusion. Disorder. Error. Mistake. Incompatibility. Mental anxieties. Alienation. Loneliness.

cards.name: Four of Swords
cards.upright: Repose. Replenishment. Solitude. Exile. Retreat. Temporary seclusion. Abandonment. Convalescence. Coping with mental illness.
cards.reversed: Activity. Circumspection. Precaution. Economy. Guarded advancement. Desire to recover what is lost.

cards.name: Five of Swords
cards.upright: Conquest. Defeat. Destruction of others. Degradation. A potential adversary. Revocation. Infamy. Dishonor. Sentimentality that weakens the will.
cards.reversed: An uncertain outlook. A possible loss or defeat. Weakness. Misfortune befalling a friend. Seduction. Burial.

cards.name: Six of Swords
cards.upright: A journey by water. Travel. Voyage. a headstrong attempt to overcome difficulty. Expedience. Success after anxiety.
cards.reversed: Stalemate. An unwanted proposal. A difficult situation without an immediate solution. A confession. A declaration.

cards.name: Seven of Swords
cards.upright: New plans. Wishes. Fortitude. Perseverance. A long-planned endeavor. Confidence. A fantasy. A unique design. Uncertain efforts. Vacillation.
cards.reversed: Arguments. Quarrels. Uncertain counsel or advice. Circumspection. Slander. Babbling. Nonsense. Unheeded wisdom.

cards.name: Eight of Swords
cards.upright: Crisis. Calamity. Conflict. Domination. Imprisonment. Turmoil. Bad news. Censure. Criticism. Sickness. Calumny. A crisis averted by a seized opportunity.
cards.reversed: Treachery. Difficulty. Manual labor. Insanity or mental illness. Depression or disquiet. A tragic accident. Death. Doom.

cards.name: Nine of Swords
cards.upright: Misery. Concern. Quarrel. Unhappiness. Miscarriage. Anxiety. Worry. Despair. Suffering. Desolation. Sleeplessness.
cards.reversed: Doubt. Suspicion. Gossip. Misinformation. Shame. Scruple. Timidity. Disrepute. Reasonable fear.

cards.name: Ten of Swords
cards.upright: Ruin. Pain. Affliction. Sadness. Anguish. Desolation. Tears. Misfortune. Trouble. Disappointment. Grief. Sorrow.
cards.reversed: Benefit. Profit. Temporary gain. Improvement. Passing success. Temporary favor. Momentary advantage.

cards.name: Page of Swords
cards.upright: Guardedness. Vigilance. Agility. Fitness. Preparation. Perception of the unknown.
cards.reversed: An imposter. The unforseen. An illness or disability. Mystery. Powerlessness. Unpreparedness.

cards.name: Knight of Swords
cards.upright: Bravery. Capacity. Youth. Dashing. Heroism. The unknown. Rashness. Warfare. Passion.
cards.reversed: Incapacity. Imprudence. Stupidity. Dispute. Ruined by a lover. Impulsivity. Conceit. Simplicity. Disunion.

cards.name: Queen of Swords
cards.upright: Quick wit. Keenness. Perception. Subtlety. Widowhood. Absence. Loneliness. Separation.
cards.reversed: Narrow-mindedness. Maliciousness. Bigotry. Deceit. Vengefulness. Prudishness. Ill temper.

cards.name: King of Swords
cards.upright: Determination. Experience. Authority. Proficiency. Analysis. Ideas. Craftmanship.
cards.reversed: Cruelty. Conflict. Selfishness. Sadism. Wickedness. A source of sadness. Perversion.

cards.name: Ace of Coins
cards.upright: Perfection. Attainment. Prosperity. Felicity. Riches. Bliss. Ecstasy. Value. Treasures. Prosperity.
cards.reversed: Prosperity without happiness. Squandered wealth. Waste. Corruption. Miserliness. Greed. Fool's gold.

cards.name: Two of Coins
cards.upright: Difficulty in launching new projects. Difficult situations arising. New troubles. Embarassment. Worry. Concern. Change which must be faced with equanimity.
cards.reversed: Literary ability. Agility in handling matters. Simulated enjoyment. Enforced gaiety. Letter. Message. Missive.

cards.name: Three of Coins
cards.upright: Great skill in trade or work. Mastery. Perfection. Artistic ability. Dignity. Renown. Power. An artisan whose work is in great demand.
cards.reversed: Sloppiness. Mediocrity. Low quality. Money problems. Commonplace ideas. Lack of skill. Preoccupation.

cards.name: Four of Coins
cards.upright: Love of material wealth. A hoarder or miser. Usury. A lack of generosity. An inability to share. Greed. A fear of financial upset. Acquisitiveness.
cards.reversed: A financial setback. An obstacle. Opposition to further gain. Suspense and delay. A spendthrift. A skinflint.

cards.name: Five of Coins
cards.upright: Material trouble. Destitution. Loss. Failure. Error. Impoverishment. A lover. Affection. Loss of job. Money problems caused by emotion.
cards.reversed: Reversal of bad trend. New interest in matters. Overcoming ruin. Disharmony in marriage or love interests.

cards.name: Six of Coins
cards.upright: Generosity. A philanthropist. Charity. Kindness. Gratification. Gifts. Material gain. Shared wealth. Measured generosity. A much-needed favor.
cards.reversed: Avarice. Selfishness. Envy. Jealousy. An ungiving person. Bad debts. An unpaid loan. Condescension.

cards.name: Seven of Coins
cards.upright: Ingenuity. Growth and progress. Hard work. A shrewd, successful deal. Money or wealth. Treasure. Reorganization. Upcoming dividends.
cards.reversed: Anxiety. Impatience. Uneasiness. Imprudent actions. Loss of money. Unwise investments. An unstable economy.

cards.name: Eight of Coins
cards.upright: Apprenticeship. Craftsmanship. An ability to learn quickly. Candor and frankness. Modesty. Meticulous handiwork. Personal effort. Focused commitment.
cards.reversed: Lack of ambition. Vanity. Conceit. Disillusionment. Usury. A hypocrite. Flattery. Intrigue. Laziness.

cards.name: Nine of Coins
cards.upright: Accomplishment. Discernment. Discretion. Foresight. Safety. Prudence. Material well-being. Love of nature. A sheltered environment. Cautious exploration.
cards.reversed: A threat to safety. Roguery. Storms or bad weather. Bad faith. Possible loss. A valued friendship ending. A treasured possession lost.

cards.name: Ten of Coins
cards.upright: Prosperity. Riches. Security. Safety. Family. Family matters. Ancestry. Inheritance. Home. Dwelling. Heirlooms. Rewards of old age and experience.
cards.reversed: Poor risk. Bad odds. A possible loss. Hazard. A robbery. Loss of inheritance. Dissipation. A gambler. Games of chance.

cards.name: Page of Coins
cards.upright: Deep concentration and application. Study. Scholarship. Reflection. Respect for knowledge. Desire for learning and new ideas. A do-gooder. Bearer of news.
cards.reversed: An unrealistic person. Dissipation of ideas. Illogical thinking. Rebelliousness. Wastefulness. Loss. Unfavorable news.

cards.name: Knight of Coins
cards.upright: A mature and responsible person. A reliable person. Patience. Persistence. The ability to conclude a task. Organization. Capability. A dependable person.
cards.reversed: Stagnation. Carelessness. Inertia. Lack of determination or direction. Narrow-mindedness. Dogmatic views. Idleness.

cards.name: Queen of Coins
cards.upright: Prosperity and well-being. Luxury. Extreme comfort. Security. Magnificence. Grace. Dignity. A generous, charitable person of means. A noble soul.
cards.reversed: False prosperity. Suspense. Suspicion. Responsibilities neglected. A vicious person. An untrusting person. Fear of failure.

cards.name: King of Coins
cards.upright: An experienced, successful leader. Character and intelligence. Business acumen. Mathematical ability. A loyal friend. A reliable marriage partner. Wise investments.
cards.reversed: Corruption. A Machiavellian person. Vice. Avarice. Unfaithfulness. A vicious man. Peril. Hunger for power. A betrayal.

cards.name: Ace of Wands
cards.upright: Creation or beginning. Invention. A new endeavor. Fortune or monetary gain. Newfound fame or renown. An inheritance. A child's birth. The beginning of a meaningful experience. An adventure.
cards.reversed: A false start. A cloudy outlook. An unrealized goal. Decadence. Empty existence. Vexation. A cancelled plan. An occupation without passion.

cards.name: Two of Wands
cards.upright: Maturity. A ruler. Goals/needs fulfilled. Boldness and courage. A dominant personality. Melancholy despite worldly riches.
cards.reversed: Sadness. Trouble. Restraint caused by others. Societal pressure. Loss of faith. Surprise. An unearned acheivment.

cards.name: Three of Wands
cards.upright: Practical knowledge. Business acumen. Strength. Enterprise. Negotiations. Trade. Commerce. A great undertaking. Import and export in business.
cards.reversed: An ulterior motive. Treachery. Diminishing adversity. Suspicious help. A hidden agenda. Adverse business advice.

cards.name: Four of Wands
cards.upright: Romance. A harmonious group. Newly acquired prosperity. Peace and tranquility. Rest after strife. Concord. Unity. Repose.
cards.reversed: Loss of full tranquility. Unfulfilled romance. Insecurity. Tarnished beauty. Incomplete happiness. Worry.

cards.name: Five of Wands
cards.upright: Struggle. Hard labor. Violent conflict or strife. An obstacle. A competition. A fight. Aggression. Martial arts. Violent sports.
cards.reversed: Trickery. Contradictions. Complexity. Involvement. Caution against indecision. Ability to use dispute for personal gain.

cards.name: Six of Wands
cards.upright: Good news. Advancement. Expectation. A desire realized. A payoff. A promotion. A skill/ability recognized. An idea implemented.
cards.reversed: Indefinite delay. Fear. Apprehension. Disloyalty. A superficial benefit. An inconclusive gain. Fleeting fame.

cards.name: Seven of Wands
cards.upright: Success. Strategic gain. Obstacles and challenges. Overwhelming odds surmounted. An advantage. Victory. Valor. A successful negotiation.
cards.reversed: Consternation. Anxiety. Embarrassment. Indecision. A loss caused by hesitation. Uncertainty. Perplexity. Doubt.

cards.name: Eight of Wands
cards.upright: Swift activity. Sudden progress or movement. Speed. A hasty decision. A premature development. A message delivered instantly.
cards.reversed: Jealousy. Harassment. A legal dispute. An injury caused by negligence. Discord. Delay. Stagnation. A domestic quarrel.

cards.name: Nine of Wands
cards.upright: Expectation of difficulty/change. Awaiting tribulation. Anticipation. A hidden enemy. Deception. Discipline. Order. A pause to a current struggle.
cards.reversed: An obstacle. Adversity. Problems. Delays. Displeasure. A serious disaster. Barriers to overcome. Ill health.

cards.name: Ten of Wands
cards.upright: Feeling overburdened. Excessive pressure. Problems soon to be resolved. Effort to meet a goal. Power used for selfish ends.
cards.reversed: Difficulties. Intrigues. Duplicity. Treachery. A traitor. A deceiver. Subterfuge. An inevitable loss.

cards.name: Page of Wands
cards.upright: A faithful, loyal person. An envoy or emissary. A trusted friend. A stranger with good intentions. A consistent person. A bearer of important news.
cards.reversed: Reluctance. Instability. Ruin caused by indecision. A gossip. A bearer of bad tidings. Displeasure.

cards.name: Knight of Wands
cards.upright: Departure. A journey. Advancement into the unknown. Flight. Absence. Change of residence. Traveler. Emigration. A dark young man.
cards.reversed: Discord. Interruption. Unexpected change. Quarreling. A breakup. Rupture. Discontinuance.

cards.name: Queen of Wands
cards.upright: A sympathetic and understanding person. Friendliness. Lovingness. Honor. Practicality. Ability for meaningful expression and love. Sincere interest in others.
cards.reversed: Jealousy. Deceit. Possible infidelity. Unstable emotions. Fickleness. Resistance. An obstacle. Opposition.

cards.name: King of Wands
cards.upright: An honest and conscientious person. Maturity. Devotion. Friendliness. Sympathy. An educated gentleman. A married person. A fatherly person.
cards.reversed: Severity. Austerity. Hyperbole. Dogmatism. Slavish devotion. Deliberateness. Intolerance.

cards.name: Ace of Cups
cards.upright: Great abundance. Fulfillment. Perfection. Fertility. Opulence. Happiness. Productiveness. Beauty and pleasure. Goodness overflowing. A favorable outlook.
cards.reversed: Change. Alteration. Erosion. Instability. Sterility. Unrequited love. Clouded joy. A false heart. Inconsistency.

cards.name: Two of Cups
cards.upright: Friendship. Passion. Engagement. Renewal. Understanding. Cooperation. Partnership. Unity against all odds. Agreement. Harmony.
cards.reversed: An unsatisfactory love. A false friendship. A troubled relationship. Divorce. Crossed desires. Opposition. Misunderstanding.

cards.name: Three of Cups
cards.upright: Resolution of a problem. Conclusion. Solace. Healing. A satisfactory result. Fulfillment. Compromise. Friendship among women. Inspiration in arts.
cards.reversed: Excess. Overabundance. Indulgence. Superfluity. Loss of prestige. A fall from grace. Delays. Ingratitude.

cards.name: Four of Cups
cards.upright: Weariness. Aversion. Disgust. Disappointment. Unhappiness. Bitterness. Stagnation. Discontent in spite of abundance.
cards.reversed: New possibilities. New relationships. New approaches to old problems. New acquaintance. New knowledge.

cards.name: Five of Cups
cards.upright: Partial loss. Regret. A shallow, meaningless friendship. A loveless marriage. Imperfection. A flaw. Inheritance. An incomplete union or partnership.
cards.reversed: A hopeful outlook. Favorable expectations. New alliances. Affinity. The return of an old friend. Reunion.

cards.name: Six of Cups
cards.upright: Memories. Past influences. Things that have vanished. Childhood passed. Nostalgia. Faded images. Longing. Insight from reflecting on the past.
cards.reversed: A newly-realized future. An opportunity ahead. An upcoming event or arrival. New viewpoints. A formerly unimaginable possibility. Plans that may fail.

cards.name: Seven of Cups
cards.upright: Fantasy. An unrealistic attitude. Imagination. Daydreams. Foolish whims. Wishful thinking. Illusionary success. Style without substance. A naïve person.
cards.reversed: Desire. Determination. Strong willpower. A goal nearly attained. Intelligent choice. Perseverance. Resolution.

cards.name: Eight of Cups
cards.upright: Discontinuance of effort. Disappointment. Abandonment of previous plans. Shyness. Modesty. Success abandoned, possibly for something better. Indolence.
cards.reversed: Effort continued until full success is attained. Festivity. Joy. Gaiety. Feasting. Pleasure. Holidays.

cards.name: Nine of Cups
cards.upright: Success. Windfall. Advantage. Well-being. Abundance. Good health. Victory. Difficulties surmounted. Stability. Fulfillment.
cards.reversed: A terrible mistake. Material loss. Imperfections. Misplaced truth. False freedom. Opposition. Difference. Dispute.

cards.name: Ten of Cups
cards.upright: A home or abode. A sense of belonging. Contentment. Family life. Esteem. Virtue. A good reputation. Community support.
cards.reversed: A lost friendship. Unhappiness. Family quarreling. Pettiness. Rage. Combat. Strife. Opposition. A difference of opinion.

cards.name: Page of Cups
cards.upright: Studiousness. Reflection. Meditation. Loyalty. Focused effort. Much-needed help. Trustworthiness. Timeliness.
cards.reversed: Inclination. Deviation. Susceptibility. Distraction. Seduction. Flattery. Co-dependence.

cards.name: Knight of Cups
cards.upright: An impending opportunity. A momentous arrival. A major development. Sex appeal. Inducement. Request. A challenge. A proposal.
cards.reversed: Subtlety. Artifice. Trickery. Deception. Fraud. A sly, cunning person. A swindler.

cards.name: Queen of Cups
cards.upright: Warmth. Fairness. Poetry. Adoration. Friendship. Motherhood. Devotion. Honesty. Intelligence. Clairvoyance.
cards.reversed: Dishonor. Immorality. Promiscuity. Dishonesty. Unreliability. Vice. Untrustworthiness.

cards.name: King of Cups
cards.upright: Responsibility. Creativity. Scholarship. A professional. A businessman. A lawyer. A religious person. Scientific advancement. An artist. Generosity.
cards.reversed: Artistic temperament. Double-dealing. Dishonesty. Scandal. Ruin. Injustice. A crafty person without virtue. Shiftiness.
